headline.main: CIVIL EMPLOYES ASK NAZI DEFEAT; Convention, by Vote of 183 to 7, Urges a 'Torrent' of Supplies to Those Fighting Axis ASSAILS LINDBERGH, NYE ' Enemies of People,' Says Resolution Adopted at Lansing -- Union Fights 'Red' Inquiry

lead_paragraph: LANSING, Mich., Sept. 25 -- By a voted of 183 to 7, the biennial convention of the State, County and Municipal Workers of America, C.I.O., adopted today a resolution defining the military defeat of Hitlerism as the primary task confronting the United States and calling for a "torrent" of supplies from this country to Great Britain, Soviet Russia and China.
abstract: Lindbergh and Nye scored by State, County and Munic Workers of Amer (CIO)

keywords.name: organizations
keywords.value: STATE, COUNTY AND MUNIC WORKERS OF AMER
